name: netflow-v9
description: YANG model to represent the information collected in a Netflow version 9 export packet

prefix-length-ipv4.description: The length of subnet prefix in IPv4

prefix-length-ipv6.description: The length of the subnet prefix in IPv6

protocol-type.description: Possible values of IP protocol byte

engine-type.description: Possible types of flow switching engine for Netflow v9

top-label-type.description: Possible types of MPLS Top Label for Netflow v9

forwarding-status-type.description: Possible types of forwarding status for Netflow v9

igmp-type.description: Possible values of Internet Group Management Protocol (IGMP) packet type

sampling-mode-type.description: Possible modes of sampling in Netflow v9

direction-type.description: Possible Flow directions in Netflow v9

tcp-flags-type.description: Possible TCP flags seen in an IP flow
